item.title: Data Mining Review Note
item.description: Introduction I made this material as a final review note for QMUL-BUPT Module BBU6504: Data Mining. It covers key points. Note Some parts of material are adapted from the BBU6504 lecture slides and is intended for personal study and educational use only. Download Block3 Note.pdf

item.title: Machine Leaning Final Revision Tutorial
item.description: Introduction This review note is madeI made this material as a final review note for QMUL Module CBU5201: Machine Leaning. It covers key points and some most difficult parts of this module. Tutorial I voluntarily conducted two 2-hour online tutorials to help students preparing for resit exams, in response to an initiative by the school. This material was created for that purpose. Note Some parts of material are adapted from teaching slides of CBU5201: Machine Leaning, especially some screenshots of those slides.

item.title: Intelligent Science and Technology: Survival Guide
item.description: Todo This blog will be completed after the final exam to give a survival guide for IST based on my personal experience.

item.title: AI Law Final Review Note
item.description: Introduction I made this material as a final review note for QMUL Module EBU5107: AI Law. It covers key points from Teaching Block3(AI and Intellectual Property) and Block4(AI and Privacy&Security). Note Some parts of material are adapted from the EBU5017 lecture slides and is intended for personal study and educational use only. Download Block3 Note.pdf

item.title: MLnote1:What does it mean to sample from a distribution?
item.description: This post was supposed to be finished and published. However, I did a bad job in Machine Learning final exam, therefore, I feel sad when I edit anything related to machine learning. So this post won’t be finished.

item.title: My paper for CUMCM2024
item.description: I participated in the 2024 China Undergraduate Mathematical Contest in Modeling(CUMCM) and won the national second prize. Our team’s winning paper is attached here for reference. If you want to know more about this paper and Mathematicl Modeling, you can visit the website of Haitong Lan(https://noisierier.github.io/p/my-mathematical-modeling/), one of my teammates.

item.title: Digital Circuit Design Final Revision Tutorial
item.description: Introduction I made this material as a final review note for QMUL Module EBU4202: Digital Circuit Design. It covers key points and some most difficult parts from Teaching Block1‚Äî‚ÄîBlock3. Block4 is not included due to time limit. Tutorial I hosted and ran the tutorial on June 11, 2024 from 7:30 PM to 9:30 PM to help BUPT-QMUL students review the course Digital Circuit Design. The tutorial was for students from two majors, which are Intelligence Science and Technology and Electronic Information Engineering.

About Me üëã I am currently an undergraduate student, majoring in Intelligence Science and Technology, in the Joint Programme at Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications(BUPT)üá®üá≥ and Queen Mary University of London(QMUL)üá¨üáß. I am also a student member of The Institution of Engineering and Technology(IET). My research interests cover Natural Language Processing. Working Expeirence I am now interning at TsinghuaNLP Lab, Tsinghua University. Before that, I worked as an intern(visiting student) at Deep Learning Lab, Westlake University(Hangzhou, China), from July 2024 to August 2024.
